title: The Weird of the Wentworths, Vol. 1; A Tale of George IV's Time
author: Scotus, Johannes
snippet: "Oh, I am quite at home here, papa; every one may do as they please atthe Towers--it is Liberty Hall.

title: The Weird of the Wentworths, Vol. 1; A Tale of George IV's Time
author: Scotus, Johannes
snippet: "A hopeful set you all seem," said the good-natured Earl; "however, thisis Liberty Hall, every one to his own mind, and no questions asked."

title: Noctes ambrosianæ,
author: Wilson, John
snippet: No compulsion here ; this is Liberty Hall : but you must tell a story, Shepherd, or drink the forfeit.

title: The Edinburgh tales.
author: Johnstone, C. I.
snippet: It does not signify talking, Baron ! You do as you like, of course, in my house Liberty Hall ! No lady to interfere  with you.

title: Our Street. Memories of Buccleuch Place
author: Livingston, Josiah.
snippet: to, for it was Liberty Hall.
